title: DAPP Scholarship  |  DePaul Admission Partnership Program  |  Transfer Student  |  Types of Admission  |  Admission & Aid  |  DePaul University | DePaul University, Chicago
content: Transfer Student Prepare to Transfer Transferring Your Courses Meet Your Transfer Counselor DePaul Admission Partnership ProgramRecent Recent University Center Partnerships For Advisors Apply Online Request Info Visit Campus DePaul University>Admission & Aid>Types of Admission>Transfer Student>DePaul Admission Partnership Program>Scholarship Award DAPP Scholarship The DePaul Admission Partnership Program (DAPP) Scholarship (valued at $9,000 per year) will be awarded to eligible transfer students who are part of DAPP. To be considered for a DAPP Scholarship, you must: Be a DAPP participant ready to enroll at DePaul for the fall, winter, or spring quarter. Complete the admission application process, including the submission of official transcripts from all previous colleges attended. Have a 3.0 cumulative grade point average (GPA) in all prior college coursework, and earn at least 15 cumulative semester hours of transfer credit at the time of admission. Notify the Office of Undergraduate Admission that he or she is prepared to enroll at DePaul. Copy of PTK membership card Copy of PTK membership certificate Confirmation of PTK membership noted on official college transcript Please email us attransferscholarship@depaul.eduwith confirmation of your participation. Please note that students participating in DAPP are not eligible for the Transfer Scholarship.â€‹
